sentences.sContent: A giant clam’s siphon is used to draw in water to filter and consume passing plankton.
sentences.sContent_eng: A giant clam’s siphon is used to draw in water to filter and consume passing plankton.
sentences.sCn: 巨型蛤蚌的虹吸管是被用来以过吸水的方式过滤并吸食经过的浮游生物。

sentences.sContent: BP says it expects to siphon oil from a gushing well in the Gulf of Mexico later tonight.
sentences.sContent_eng: BP says it expects to siphon oil from a gushing well in the Gulf of Mexico later tonight.
sentences.sCn: 英国石油公司表示今晚有望从墨西哥湾油井中用虹吸管把油抽走。

trans.tranOther: a bent tube used for getting liquid out of a container, used by holding one end of the tube at a lower level than the end in the container
to remove liquid from a container by using a siphon
